articleContent:
✦Event Duration✦ 

2024/06/06 10:00 - 2024/06/27 03:59 (Server Time)


✦Rewards✦ 

You can win up to Astrite x460, Malleable Elite Class Echo x2, Premium Resonance Potion x6, Premium Sealed Tube x6, Premium Tuner x150 and other development materials in this event.


✦Details✦ 

10 domains will be open for this event to challenge, each with diverse special buffs to obtain. Try adjusting your lineup to maximize your strength in battle.

Within a limited time, earn more points as you defeat more enemies in successive waves. Corresponding rewards will be given when your scores meet the requirements.
articleTitle: Event Notice | Alloy Smelt — Limited-time Battle Challenge Coming Soon!
